summary: Advanced Task Management Features Implementation Plan
FastAPI User Registration Failing on Vercel
Enhanced task management with table and recurring task improvements
Fixed subtask format bug, added normalization
Task CSV to Motido JSON Conversion with Recurrence
Add Start Date Column, Icons, CSV Export

message.content: Give me an executive summary of what's been accomplished in this repo in the past few weeks via git, and then also give me a breakdown of how many lines of code they are, what the language makeup is, how many of those are tests, and then statistics about test suite methodology and pipelines, and the deployment methodology. basically i want to show off to my software engineering team coworkers how productive i've been on this personal project over the winter break, and then also give them an idea of how large the project is and how methodical/well structured it is

content.thinking:
The user wants a comprehensive summary of their project to show off to coworkers. They need:

1. Executive summary of recent git activity (past few weeks)
2. Lines of code breakdown by language
3. Test code vs production code breakdown
4. Test suite methodology and pipelines
5. Deployment methodology

Let me gather this information using various tools. I'll need to:
1. Look at git log for recent commits
2. Count lines of code by language
3. Analyze test files
4. Look at CI/CD configuration
5. Look at deployment setup

Let me run several commands in parallel to gather this information.

content.text: I'll gather all the information you need to show off your project. Let me run several analyses in parallel.

   322        uses: snok/install-poetry@v1

   331        with:
   332          path: .venv
   333          key: venv-${{ runner.os }}-${{ hashFiles('poetry.lock') }}

   335      - name: Install Python dependencies

   337        run: poetry install --no-interaction --no-root
   338
   339      - name: Install project
   340        run: poetry install --no-interaction
   341
   342      - name: Install frontend dependencies
   343        working-directory: frontend
   344        run: npm ci
   345
   346      - name: Install Playwright browsers
   347        working-directory: frontend
   348        run: npx playwright install --with-deps chromium
   349
   350      - name: Start backend server
   351        run: |
   352          echo "Starting backend with DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL"
   353          poetry run uvicorn motido.api.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 &
   354          echo "Waiting for backend to start..."
   355          for i in {1..30}; do
   356            if curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/health > /dev/null 2>&1; then
   357              echo "Backend ready!"
   358              break
   359            fi
   360            sleep 1
   361          done
   362
   363          # Verify database connectivity via the db health endpoint
   364          echo "Verifying database connectivity..."
   365          for i in {1..15}; do
   366            response=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://localhost:8000/api/health/db)
   367            if [ "$response" = "200" ]; then
   368              echo "Database connection verified!"
   369              break
   370            fi
   371            echo "Database not ready (status: $response), retrying in 2 seconds... (attempt $i/15)"
   372            sleep 2
   373          done
   374
   375          # Final check - if still not ready, show the error
   376          response=$(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/health/db)
   377          echo "Final db health response: $response"
   378
   379      - name: Run E2E tests (shard ${{ matrix.shardIndex }}/${{ matrix.shardTotal }})
   380        working-directory: frontend
   381        run: npx playwright test --shard=${{ matrix.shardIndex }}/${{ matrix.shardTotal }}
   382
   383      - name: Upload Playwright report
   384        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
   385        if: always()
   386        with:
   387          name: playwright-report-shard-${{ matrix.shardIndex }}
   388          path: frontend/playwright-report/
   389          retention-days: 30
   390
   391      - name: Upload test failure artifacts
   392        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
   393        if: failure()
   394        with:
   395          name: test-failure-artifacts-shard-${{ matrix.shardIndex }}
   396          path: frontend/test-results/
   397          retention-days: 7

   403    name: CI Success
   404    needs:
   405      - python-lint
   406      - python-typecheck
   407      - python-test
   408      - python-security

   410      - frontend-test

   412      - e2e-tests
   413    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
   414    permissions:
   415      contents: read
   416    if: always()
   417    steps:
   418      - name: Check all jobs passed
   419        run: |
   420          # Security job is allowed to fail (continue-on-error: true)
   421          # Check only required jobs for success
   422          if [[ "${{ needs.python-lint.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
   423             [[ "${{ needs.python-typecheck.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
   424             [[ "${{ needs.python-test.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
   425             [[ "${{ needs.frontend-lint.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
   426             [[ "${{ needs.frontend-test.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
   427             [[ "${{ needs.frontend-build.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
   428             [[ "${{ needs.e2e-tests.result }}" != "success" ]]; then
   429            echo "One or more required jobs failed"
   430            exit 1
   431          fi
   432
   433          # Report security status (informational only)
   434          if [[ "${{ needs.python-security.result }}" != "success" ]]; then
   435            echo " Security scan had warnings or failures (non-blocking)"
   436          fi
   437
   438          echo " All required CI checks passed!"

file.content:
name: CI
permissions:
  contents: read

on:
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]
  push:
    branches: [main]

concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  # ============================================
  # Python Backend Tests
  # ============================================
  python-lint:
    name: Python Lint & Format Check
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.13"

      - name: Install Poetry
        uses: snok/install-poetry@v1
        with:
          version: 1.8.5
          virtualenvs-create: true
          virtualenvs-in-project: true

      - name: Load cached venv
        id: cached-poetry-dependencies
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: .venv
          key: venv-${{ runner.os }}-${{ hashFiles('poetry.lock') }}

      - name: Install dependencies
        if: steps.cached-poetry-dependencies.outputs.cache-hit != 'true'
        run: poetry install --no-interaction --no-root

      - name: Install project
        run: poetry install --no-interaction

      - name: Check formatting with Black
        run: poetry run black --check .

      - name: Check import sorting with isort
        run: poetry run isort --check-only .

      - name: Lint with Pylint
        run: poetry run pylint src tests --fail-under=10

  python-typecheck:
    name: Python Type Check
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.13"

      - name: Install Poetry
        uses: snok/install-poetry@v1
        with:
          version: 1.8.5
          virtualenvs-create: true
          virtualenvs-in-project: true

      - name: Load cached venv
        id: cached-poetry-dependencies
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: .venv
          key: venv-${{ runner.os }}-${{ hashFiles('poetry.lock') }}

      - name: Install dependencies
        if: steps.cached-poetry-dependencies.outputs.cache-hit != 'true'
        run: poetry install --no-interaction --no-root

      - name: Install project
        run: poetry install --no-interaction

      - name: Type check with Mypy
        run: poetry run mypy src tests

  python-test:
    name: Python Tests
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.13"

      - name: Install Poetry
        uses: snok/install-poetry@v1
        with:
          version: 1.8.5
          virtualenvs-create: true
          virtualenvs-in-project: true

      - name: Load cached venv
        id: cached-poetry-dependencies
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: .venv
          key: venv-${{ runner.os }}-${{ hashFiles('poetry.lock') }}

      - name: Install dependencies
        if: steps.cached-poetry-dependencies.outputs.cache-hit != 'true'
        run: poetry install --no-interaction --no-root

      - name: Install project
        run: poetry install --no-interaction

      - name: Run tests with coverage
        run: poetry run pytest --cov=motido --cov-report=xml --cov-report=term-missing --cov-fail-under=100

      - name: Upload coverage reports
        uses: codecov/codecov-action@v4
        with:
          file: ./coverage.xml
          flags: python
          fail_ci_if_error: false
        env:
          CODECOV_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CODECOV_TOKEN }}

  python-security:
    name: Python Security Scan
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.13"

      - name: Install Poetry
        uses: snok/install-poetry@v1
        with:
          version: 1.8.5
          virtualenvs-create: true
          virtualenvs-in-project: true

      - name: Load cached venv
        id: cached-poetry-dependencies
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: .venv
          key: venv-${{ runner.os }}-${{ hashFiles('poetry.lock') }}

      - name: Install dependencies
        if: steps.cached-poetry-dependencies.outputs.cache-hit != 'true'
        run: poetry install --no-interaction --no-root

      - name: Install project
        run: poetry install --no-interaction

      - name: Security scan with Safety
        run: poetry run safety scan
        continue-on-error: true  # Don't fail PR on security warnings

  # ============================================
  # Frontend Tests
  # ============================================
  frontend-lint:
    name: Frontend Lint & Type Check
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
    defaults:
      run:
        working-directory: frontend
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "20"
          cache: "npm"
          cache-dependency-path: frontend/package-lock.json

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Lint with ESLint
        run: npm run lint

      - name: Type check with TypeScript
        run: npx tsc --noEmit

  frontend-test:
    name: Frontend Tests
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
    defaults:
      run:
        working-directory: frontend
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "20"
          cache: "npm"
          cache-dependency-path: frontend/package-lock.json

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Run tests with coverage
        run: npm run test:coverage

      - name: Check coverage meets 100% threshold
        run: |
          # Vitest enforces thresholds in vite.config.ts
          # The test:coverage command will fail if coverage < 100%
          echo " Coverage threshold check passed (enforced by Vitest config)"

      - name: Upload coverage reports
        uses: codecov/codecov-action@v4
        with:
          file: ./frontend/coverage/coverage-final.json
          flags: frontend
          fail_ci_if_error: false
        env:
          CODECOV_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CODECOV_TOKEN }}

  frontend-build:
    name: Frontend Build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
    defaults:
      run:
        working-directory: frontend
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "20"
          cache: "npm"
          cache-dependency-path: frontend/package-lock.json

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Build
        run: npm run build

  # ============================================
  # E2E Tests (Playwright) - Sharded for Speed
  # ============================================
  e2e-tests:
    name: E2E Tests (Shard ${{ matrix.shardIndex }}/${{ matrix.shardTotal }})
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [frontend-build, python-test]
    permissions:
      contents: read
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix:
        shardIndex: [1, 2, 3]
        shardTotal: [3]
    services:
      postgres:
        image: postgres:16-alpine
        env:
          POSTGRES_USER: motido_test
          POSTGRES_PASSWORD: motido_test_password
          POSTGRES_DB: motido_test
        ports:
          - 5433:5432
        options: >-
          --health-cmd "pg_isready -U motido_test -d motido_test"
          --health-interval 10s
          --health-timeout 5s
          --health-retries 5
    env:
      DATABASE_URL: postgresql://motido_test:motido_test_password@localhost:5433/motido_test
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "20"
          cache: "npm"
          cache-dependency-path: frontend/package-lock.json

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.13"

      - name: Install Poetry
        uses: snok/install-poetry@v1
        with:
          version: 1.8.5
          virtualenvs-create: true
          virtualenvs-in-project: true

      - name: Load cached Python venv
        id: cached-poetry-dependencies
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: .venv
          key: venv-${{ runner.os }}-${{ hashFiles('poetry.lock') }}

      - name: Install Python dependencies
        if: steps.cached-poetry-dependencies.outputs.cache-hit != 'true'
        run: poetry install --no-interaction --no-root

      - name: Install project
        run: poetry install --no-interaction

      - name: Install frontend dependencies
        working-directory: frontend
        run: npm ci

      - name: Install Playwright browsers
        working-directory: frontend
        run: npx playwright install --with-deps chromium

      - name: Start backend server
        run: |
          echo "Starting backend with DATABASE_URL=$DATABASE_URL"
          poetry run uvicorn motido.api.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 &
          echo "Waiting for backend to start..."
          for i in {1..30}; do
            if curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/health > /dev/null 2>&1; then
              echo "Backend ready!"
              break
            fi
            sleep 1
          done

          # Verify database connectivity via the db health endpoint
          echo "Verifying database connectivity..."
          for i in {1..15}; do
            response=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" http://localhost:8000/api/health/db)
            if [ "$response" = "200" ]; then
              echo "Database connection verified!"
              break
            fi
            echo "Database not ready (status: $response), retrying in 2 seconds... (attempt $i/15)"
            sleep 2
          done

          # Final check - if still not ready, show the error
          response=$(curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/health/db)
          echo "Final db health response: $response"

      - name: Run E2E tests (shard ${{ matrix.shardIndex }}/${{ matrix.shardTotal }})
        working-directory: frontend
        run: npx playwright test --shard=${{ matrix.shardIndex }}/${{ matrix.shardTotal }}

      - name: Upload Playwright report
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        if: always()
        with:
          name: playwright-report-shard-${{ matrix.shardIndex }}
          path: frontend/playwright-report/
          retention-days: 30

      - name: Upload test failure artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
        if: failure()
        with:
          name: test-failure-artifacts-shard-${{ matrix.shardIndex }}
          path: frontend/test-results/
          retention-days: 7

  # ============================================
  # Summary Job (required check)
  # ============================================
  ci-success:
    name: CI Success
    needs:
      - python-lint
      - python-typecheck
      - python-test
      - python-security
      - frontend-lint
      - frontend-test
      - frontend-build
      - e2e-tests
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
    if: always()
    steps:
      - name: Check all jobs passed
        run: |
          # Security job is allowed to fail (continue-on-error: true)
          # Check only required jobs for success
          if [[ "${{ needs.python-lint.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.python-typecheck.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.python-test.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.frontend-lint.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.frontend-test.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.frontend-build.result }}" != "success" ]] || \
             [[ "${{ needs.e2e-tests.result }}" != "success" ]]; then
            echo "One or more required jobs failed"
            exit 1
          fi

          # Report security status (informational only)
          if [[ "${{ needs.python-security.result }}" != "success" ]]; then
            echo " Security scan had warnings or failures (non-blocking)"
          fi

          echo " All required CI checks passed!"

#!/bin/bash
# check-all.sh - Run all CI checks locally (sign-off workflow)
# This script runs the same checks that run in CI/CD, including E2E tests
#
# Usage:
#   ./scripts/check-all.sh              # Run ALL tests including E2E (default)
#   ./scripts/check-all.sh --skip-e2e   # Skip E2E tests (unit tests only)
#   ./scripts/check-all.sh --unit-only  # Same as --skip-e2e

set -e  # Exit on first error

# Parse arguments - E2E is ON by default
RUN_E2E=true
for arg in "$@"; do
  case $arg in
    --skip-e2e|--unit-only)
      RUN_E2E=false
      shift
      ;;
  esac
done

echo "===================================="
echo "Running Python Backend Checks"
echo "===================================="

echo ""
echo " Formatting code with isort and black..."
poetry run isort .
poetry run black .

echo ""
echo " Type checking with mypy..."
poetry run mypy src tests

echo ""
echo " Linting with pylint..."
poetry run pylint src tests --fail-under=10

echo ""

# Moti-Do: Winter Break Development Summary
